description: These emotes are waving both of their hands in the air as if they just don’t care. They look silly but don’t have a care in the world. ヾ and ﾉ make perfect waving arms. If you are having a hard time seeing some of these characters and they are showing up as boxes instead, try switching over to Safari.  ヾ(・◇・)ﾉ ヽ(ﾟ◇ﾟ )ﾉ ヾ(๑╹ꇴ◠๑)ﾉ” ヽ(･∀･)ﾉ ヾ(◍’౪`◍)ﾉﾞ♡ ヾ(๑ㆁᗜㆁ๑)ﾉ” ヾ(＠⌒ー⌒＠)ノ ヾ(oﾟｘﾟo)ﾉ ヾ(*❦ω❦)ノ ヽ(๏∀๏ )ﾉ ヾ(´｡••｡`)ﾉ ヾ(Ő∀Ő๑)ﾉ ヾ(´(ｴ)｀ﾉﾞ ヾ( ´｡ •x• ｡` )ﾉ” ヾ(˹ᆺ˺✿)ﾉﾞ ヾ(´￢｀)ﾉ ヾ(*´∀｀*)ﾉ ヾ(´∀｀○)ﾉ ヾ(＾-＾)ノ ヾ(๑╹ヮ╹๑)ﾉ” ヾ(・ᆺ・✿)ﾉﾞ ヽ(´▽`)ﾉ ヽ(｡･c_，･｡)ﾉﾞ ヾ(῀ ⚙⌄⚙ ῀)ﾉ” ヾ( o･∀)ﾉﾞ ヾ(o･∀･o)ﾉﾞ ヾ(∀･o )ﾉﾞ ヾ(ﾟдﾟ)ﾉ゛ ヾ(*･∀･*）/☆ﾟ。･＋ ヾ(・m・*)ノ゛
title: Waving both Hands
